issue.title: Buildings in task 1 are saturated black and hill textures took a step backwards

content.raw:
I don't see the issue with the black house you're having, might be a graphics card issue or use of old gazebo_models version? My camera view: http://i.imgur.com/tdNcdx5.jpg

Independent of that, shouldn't you be robust to black stuff next to the road? ;) 

But yea, a larger texture size for the heightmap in task 1 would be nicer given that it's just in the far distance. The request for smaller texture size only applied to task 2 where the terrain is close to the camera.
